name: Calk Seven
description:
My entry for the Ludum Dare 44 and my second solo game jam. I made this game in 48h, special thanks to Loline Bongiraud for drawing the main character.

Controls :

  • WASD to move
  • Shift to dash
  • Left Click to use spell
  • Right Click to change spell

It turns out that I had to cut a lot of my design choices because I didn't have the time to implement it, and that's why the game don't probably fit the theme.
